Title: 🖼 🗺 Favourability of Kamala Harris in the last weeks 📝 Source:...
Description: 🗺 Favourability of Kamala Harris in the last weeks📝 Source: 538📝 NOTE: The graph is based on data from all opinions polls conducted during the last 4 weeks. Even better, Harris is the current Vice President, and she can actually push for some of her policies immediately. This rise in popularity can be attributed to mass media support and indicates how most Western democracies are rather ochlocracies.🗺 @PoliticsGR
